00025 using namespace std;
00026 MessageHandler::MessageHandler(string path)
00027 {
00028         this->path = path;
00029 }
00030 MessageHandler* _mess_instance = NULL;
00031 Message readMessageFromQ(string fileName)
00032 {
00033         Queue q;
00034         Message msg;
00035         ifstream myfile1;
00036         myfile1.open(fileName.c_str());
00037         if (myfile1.is_open())
00038         {
00039                 boost::archive::text_iarchive ia(myfile1);
00040                 ia >> q.msgs;
00041         }
00042         msg = q.msgs.front();
00043         q.msgs.erase(q.msgs.begin());
00044         ofstream myfile;
00045         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00046         boost::archive::text_oarchive oa(myfile);
00047         oa << q.msgs;
00048         return msg;
00049 }
00050 
00051 void writeMessageToQ(Message msg,string fileName)
00052 {
00053         Queue q;
00054         ifstream myfile1;
00055         myfile1.open(fileName.c_str());
00056         if (myfile1.is_open())
00057         {
00058                 boost::archive::text_iarchive ia(myfile1);
00059                 ia >> q.msgs;
00060         }
00061         q.msgs.push_back(msg);
00062         ofstream myfile;
00063         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00064         boost::archive::text_oarchive oa(myfile);
00065         oa << q.msgs;
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool tempUnSubscribe(string subs,string fileName)
00069 {
00070         string subscribers;
00071         ifstream myfile1;
00072         myfile1.open(fileName.c_str());
00073         if (myfile1.is_open())
00074         {
00075                 while(getline(myfile1,subscribers))
00076                 {
00077                         cout << subscribers << flush;
00078                         break;
00079                 }
00080         }
00081         myfile1.close();
00082         ofstream myfile;
00083         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00084         string rep = subs + ":";
00085         boost::replace_first(subscribers,rep,"");
00086         myfile.write(subscribers.c_str(),subscribers.length());
00087         myfile.close();
00088         if(subscribers.find(":")!=string::npos)
00089                 return false;
00090         else
00091                 return true;
00092 }
00093 
00094 Message readMessageFromT(string fileName,string subs)
00095 {
00096         Queue t;
00097         Message msg;
00098         ifstream myfile1;
00099         myfile1.open(fileName.c_str());
00100         if (myfile1.is_open())
00101         {
00102                 boost::archive::text_iarchive ia(myfile1);
00103                 ia >> t.msgs;
00104         }
00105         msg = t.msgs.front();
00106         bool done = tempUnSubscribe(subs,fileName+":SubslistTemp");
00107         if(done)
00108                 t.msgs.erase(t.msgs.begin());
00109         ofstream myfile;
00110         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00111         boost::archive::text_oarchive oa(myfile);
00112         oa << t.msgs;
00113         return msg;
00114 }

00116 void writeMessageToT(Message msg,string fileName)
00117 {
00118         Queue t;
00119         ifstream myfile1;
00120         myfile1.open(fileName.c_str());
00121         if (myfile1.is_open())
00122         {
00123                 boost::archive::text_iarchive ia(myfile1);
00124                 ia >> t.msgs;
00125         }
00126         t.msgs.push_back(msg);
00127         ofstream myfile;
00128         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00129         boost::archive::text_oarchive oa(myfile);
00130         oa << t.msgs;
00131 }

00133 void subscribe(string subs,string fileName)
00134 {
00135         ifstream myfile1;
00136         myfile1.open(fileName.c_str());
00137         string subscribers;
00138         if (myfile1.is_open())
00139         {
00140                 while(getline(myfile1,subscribers))
00141                 {
00142                         cout << subscribers << flush;
00143                         break;
00144                 }
00145         }
00146         myfile1.close();
00147         ofstream myfile;
00148         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00149         subscribers += (subs + ":");
00150         myfile.write(subscribers.c_str(),subscribers.length());
00151         myfile.close();
00152         fileName += "Temp";
00153         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00154         myfile.write(subscribers.c_str(),subscribers.length());
00155         myfile.close();
00156 }

00158 void unSubscribe(string subs,string fileName)
00159 {
00160         string subscribers;
00161         ifstream myfile1;
00162         myfile1.open(fileName.c_str());
00163         if (myfile1.is_open())
00164         {
00165                 while(getline(myfile1,subscribers))
00166                 {
00167                         cout << subscribers << flush;
00168                         break;
00169                 }
00170         }
00171         myfile1.close();
00172         ofstream myfile;
00173         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00174         string rep = subs + ":";
00175         boost::replace_first(subscribers,rep,"");
00176         myfile.write(subscribers.c_str(),subscribers.length());
00177         myfile.close();
00178         fileName += "Temp";
00179         myfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00180         myfile.write(subscribers.c_str(),subscribers.length());
00181         myfile.close();
00182 }

00184 void MessageHandler::service(int fd)
00185 {
00186         char buf[MAXBUFLEN];
00187         string results;
00188         //int bytes = recv(fd, buf, sizeof buf, 0);
00189         _mess_instance->getServer()->Receive(fd,results,1024);
00190         //string temp,results;
00191         /*stringstream ss;
00192         ss << buf;
00193         while(getline(ss,temp))
00194         {
00195                 cout << temp << flush;
00196                 results.append(temp);
00197         }*/
00198         results = results.substr(0,results.find_last_of(">")+1);
00199         cout << results << flush;
00200 
00201         if(results.find("<")!=string::npos && results.find(">")!=string::npos)
00202         {
00203                 string h = "Received Message----";
00204                 Cont test;
00205                 try
00206                 {
00207                         Message msg(results);
00208                         string fileName = _mess_instance->path+msg.getDestination().getName()+":"+msg.getDestination().getType();
00209                         if(msg.getDestination().getType()=="Queue")
00210                                 writeMessageToQ(msg,fileName);
00211                         else if(msg.getDestination().getType()=="Topic")
00212                                 writeMessageToT(msg,fileName);
00213                 }
00214                 catch(Exception *e)
00215                 {
00216                         cout << e->what() << flush;
00217                 }
00218                 _mess_instance->getServer()->Send(fd,h);
00219                 //if (send(fd,&h[0] , h.length(), 0) == -1)
00220                 //      cout << "send failed" << flush;
00221                 cout << h << flush;
00222         }
00223         else if(results.find("GET FROM ")!=string::npos)
00224         {
00225                 Message msg;
00226                 if(results.find("Queue")!=string::npos)
00227                 {
00228                         boost::replace_first(results,"GET FROM ",_mess_instance->path);
00229                         msg = readMessageFromQ(results);
00230                 }
00231                 else if(results.find("Topic")!=string::npos)
00232                 {
00233                         string subs = results.substr(results.find("-")+1);
00234                         string te = "-" + subs;
00235                         boost::replace_first(results,te,"");
00236                         boost::replace_first(results,"GET FROM ",_mess_instance->path);
00237                         msg = readMessageFromT(results,subs);
00238                 }
00239                 string h;
00240                 if(results.find("Queue")!=string::npos || results.find("Topic")!=string::npos)
00241                 {
00242                         h = msg.toXml();
00243                         cout << h << flush;
00244                 }
00245                 else
00246                         h = "Improper Destination";
00247                 _mess_instance->getServer()->Send(fd,h);
00248                 //if (send(fd,&h[0] , h.length(), 0) == -1)
00249                 //      cout << "send failed" << flush;
00250         }
00251         else if(results.find("SUBSCRIBE ")!=string::npos)
00252         {
00253                 int len = results.find("TO") - results.find("SUBSCRIBE ") - 11;
00254                 string subs  = results.substr(results.find("SUBSCRIBE ")+10,len);
00255                 results = results.substr(results.find("TO ")+3);
00256                 results = (_mess_instance->path+results+":Subslist");
00257                 subscribe(subs,results);
00258                 string h = "Subscribed";
00259                 _mess_instance->getServer()->Send(fd,h);
00260                 //if (send(fd,&h[0] , h.length(), 0) == -1)
00261                 //      cout << "send failed" << flush;
00262         }
00263         else if(results.find("UNSUBSCRIBE ")!=string::npos)
00264         {
00265                 int len = results.find("TO") - results.find("UNSUBSCRIBE ") - 12;
00266                 string subs  = results.substr(results.find("UNSUBSCRIBE ")+11,len);
00267                 results = results.substr(results.find("TO ")+3);
00268                 results = (_mess_instance->path+results+":Subslist");
00269                 subscribe(subs,results);
00270                 string h = "Unsubscribed";
00271                 _mess_instance->getServer()->Send(fd,h);
00272                 //if (send(fd,&h[0] , h.length(), 0) == -1)
00273                 //      cout << "send failed" << flush;
00274         }
00275         memset(&buf[0], 0, sizeof(buf));
00276         close(fd);
00277 }

00280 void MessageHandler::init(string path)
00281 {
00282         if(_mess_instance==NULL)
00283         {
00284                 _mess_instance = new MessageHandler(path);
00285                 _mess_instance->running = false;
00286         }
00287 }
00288 
00289 void MessageHandler::trigger(string port,string path)
00290 {
00291         init(path);
00292         if(_mess_instance->running)
00293                 return;
00294         _mess_instance->setServer(new Server(port,false,500,&service,true));
00295         _mess_instance->running = true;
00296         return;
00297 }
